patthana8.31:4.1: Ganthavippayuttaṃ naganthaniyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca ganthavippayutto naganthaniyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.31:4.2: Ganthavippayuttaṃ naganthaniyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca ganthavippayutto naaganthaniyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.31:4.3: Ganthavippayuttaṃ naganthaniyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca ganthavippayutto naganthaniyo ca ganthavippayutto naaganthaniyo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. #3
patthana8.31:5.1: Ganthavippayuttaṃ naaganthaniyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca ganthavippayutto naaganthaniyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. #1
patthana8.31:6.1: Ganthavippayuttaṃ naganthaniyañca ganthavippayuttaṃ naaganthaniyañca dhammaṃ paṭicca ganthavippayutto naaganthaniyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.31:7.1: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve … pe … avigate pañca.
